Due to the collision, two rear coaches of the Visakhapatnam-Palasa Passenger train and the train engine of the Visakhapatnam-Rayagada Passenger were derailed. advertisement FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES HERE "Bogies derailed after a train travelling along with passengers from Vizianagaram to Raigad hit a passenger train travelling on the same route from Visakapatnam to Palasa," East Central Railway CPRO said.

Ray is widely considered one of the greatest and most influential film directors in the history of cinema . [7] [8] [9] [10] [11] He is celebrated for works including The Apu Trilogy (1955–1959), [12] The Music Room (1958), The Big City (1963) and Charulata (1964) and the Goopy–Bagha trilogy.
